name: Dissociating Dungeons
description:
A mysterious vengeful spirit has CURSED our intrepid adventurer and split them into two halves! (oh noOOOoOooOOoooOo!!)

Use arrow keys or WASD to move.
R to restart level.

This is our first released project! Thank you for playing :)

Browser version added - if the game doesn't let you progress pass the title screen, try refreshing your browser and not clicking on the game until it has loaded.
